actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on May 29, 2025.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on May 23, 2025, at 1:35 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 97, S. 129, S. 216, S. 1051, S.J. Res. 55, H.J. Res. 87, H.J. Res. 88, and H.J. Res. 89. Appointments: Canada-U.S. Interparliamentary Group, Congressional-Executive Commission on the People's Republic of China, and the Migratory Bird Conservation Commission.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Jake Ellzey to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
